# Copilot Instructions for -Git-Project

## Project Overview
This is a simple static HTML project consisting of a single webpage. The main content is in `index.html`, which displays a greeting message.

## Architecture
- **Single Page Application**: The entire project is contained in one HTML file (`index.html`)
- **No Framework**: Pure HTML with no JavaScript, CSS frameworks, or build tools
- **Static Content**: All content is hardcoded in the HTML file

## Key Files
- `index.html`: Main webpage displaying "Hello, World!git"
- `README.md`: Project description and title

## Development Workflow
- **Editing**: Modify `index.html` directly for any content changes
- **Viewing**: Open `index.html` in a web browser to see changes
- **No Build Required**: Changes are immediately visible without compilation or processing

## Code Patterns
- **Simple HTML Structure**: Uses basic `<p>` tags for content
- **Minimal Markup**: No complex nesting or advanced HTML features
- **Direct Text Content**: All text is embedded directly in HTML elements

## Conventions
- **File Naming**: Uses standard HTML file naming (`index.html`)
- **Content Updates**: Edit the text content within HTML tags as needed
- **No External Dependencies**: Self-contained with no links to external resources

## Common Tasks
- **Update Greeting**: Change the text in the `<p>` tag in `index.html`
- **Add Content**: Insert additional HTML elements directly in `index.html`
- **Preview Changes**: Double-click `index.html` or open in browser</content>
